name: CoCoSoSmartHome
0:
”Alexa,Turn off my TV”
”Alexa,Turn off living room light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask Alexa to turn on or off all devices you plugged into the CoCoSo power strip or power plug. When you enable this skill, you will be prompted to log into your CoCoSo Account to link to your Amazon Echo account. Please make sure that you will use the same account your used to configure your CoCoSo devices.
Please follow these simple steps to get started:

1. Enable this skill and link your CoCoSo account;

2. Once your get your account linked, discover your CoCoSo Smart Plugs or Smart Strips by telling Alexa to ‘Discover my devices’ or you can run discovery form the Alexa App.

3. After Alexa discovers your CoCoSo devices, just tell alexa to turn on or off your defined-name devices.
For example, if your plug or given socket in the Smart Strip is named “TV” in your CoCoSo app simply say

“Alexa, turn on TV" or 
“Alexa, turn off TV”

For any additional support, please visit http://www.cocoso.de for more information.
